thread.title: US Ambassador Gives ‘Make Somalia Great Again’ Hat To Somalia’s New President
thread.title_full: US Ambassador Gives ‘Make Somalia Great Again’ Hat To Somalia’s New President

author: Eric Owens
title: US Ambassador Gives ‘Make Somalia Great Again’ Hat To Somalia’s New President
text:
TOP 5491152 
The U.S. ambassador to Somalia presented a hat to the new president of Somalia bearing the slogan “Make Somalia Great Again” on Friday. US2SOM Amb Schwartz had a fruitful mtng w Pres Farmaajo 2day + presented the Pres with a cap “MAKE SOM GREAT AGAIN” https://t.co/rXHgpWFp pic.twitter.com/EWFdrRipv3 
— U.S. Mission-Somalia (@US2SOMALIA) February 17, 2017 
Ambassador Stephen Schwartz, an Obama appointee, gave the hat to Mohamed Abdullahi Farmajo, the newly-minted president of Somalia on Friday. 
Obviously, the slogan is derived from President Donald Trump’s 2016 presidential campaign slogan, “Make America Great Again.” 
The colors of the hat — light blue and white — are the colors of the Somali flag. 
Reaction to the diplomat gift varied dramatically, observes Voice of America . 
Reaction to the hat — on Twitter, at least — appears to be overwhelmingly negative. 
Some Somalis were far from amused. 
A public affairs professor at the University of Texas at Austin, Joshua Busby, was one of many Americans who found the diplomatic gift distasteful. 
Somablog, a Washington, D.C.-based online journal focused on East Africa, edited the original image with what it believed would have been a better gift. AMB Schwartz is from Buffalo. Farmaajo is from Buffalo.
